sql.if: and ( u.User_name like '%${parameter.username}%' or u.User_tele like '%${parameter.username}%' )

mapper.sql: from tower_user_tx_record r left join tower_user_info u on r.userid = u.id left join tower_user_type t on u.User_type = t.ID left join tower_city c on c.City_id =u.User_city left join Tower_district d on d.Dis_id=u.User_district left join Tower_user_level l on l.userlevel=u.User_level left join tower_user_tx_state s on s.txstate=r.state where 1 = 1
mapper.select: select u.id as userid, u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, r.Tx_id as txid, r.id as id, r.state as state, s.success as successstate, s.error as errorstate from tower_user_tx_record r left join tower_user_info u on r.userid = u.id left join Tower_user_tx_state s on s.txstate=r.state where 1=1 and r.ID =#{txid};

select u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, c.City_name as cityname, d.Dis_name as districtname, l.levelname as levelname, t.Type_name as typename, u.User_company as usercompany, r.Tx_id as txid, r.id as id, f.Charge as charge, f.Getting_now as gettingnow, f.Get_now as getnow, f.All_geting as allgeting, r.Bank_account as bankaccount, r.Bank_name as bankname, r.Bank_open as bankopen, r.Bank_cardid as bankcardid, r.Fee as fee, r.state as state, s.statename as statename, s.loadurl as loadurl, r.Add_date as adddate, r.state as state, r.Bz as bz, u.Wx_id as wxid, r.bank_back_id as bankbackid from tower_user_tx_record r left join tower_user_info u on r.userid = u.id left join tower_user_type t on u.User_type = t.ID left join tower_city c on c.City_id=u.User_city left join Tower_district d on d.Dis_id=u.User_district left join tower_user_charge f on r.userid = f.user_id left join Tower_user_tx_state s on s.txstate=r.state left join tower_user_level l on l.province=u.user_province and l.userlevel=u.User_level where 1=1
and r.ID =#{txid};

select o.id as orderidid, o.Order_id as orderid, t.Tower_id as towerid, t.Tower_name as towername, a.area_name as areaname, d.Dis_name as districtname, c.City_name as cityname, s.Fee as fee, (case s.Fee_type when 0 then '预付款' when 1 then '尾款' end ) as feetypename, s.Pay_time as paytime, ( select count(1) from tower_user_tx_source ts left join tower_order_detail td on ts.Order_id=td.id left join tower_tower_info ti on ti.id=td.Tower_id left join tower_area ta on ta.ID=ti.Tower_area left join Tower_district tdi on tdi.Dis_id=ti.Tower_district left join Tower_city tc on tc.City_id=ti.Tower_city where 1=1
and ts.Tx_id= #{txid} ) as isarea from tower_user_tx_source s left join tower_user_info u on s.user_id=u.id left join tower_order_detail o on o.ID=s.Order_id left join tower_tower_info t on t.id=o.Tower_id left join tower_area a on a.ID=t.Tower_area left join Tower_district d on d.Dis_id=t.Tower_district left join Tower_city c on c.City_id=t.Tower_city
and s.Tx_id = #{txid} and o.id>0
select s.txstate as txstate, s.statename as statename from tower_user_tx_state s where 1=1 and show=1 and province=#{province} and apply=#{apply} order by sort

select d.Do_user_name as dousername, d.Do_user_tele as dousertele, (case User_type when 0 then '用户' when 1 then '管理员' end ) as usertypename, s.statename nowstatename, d.Do_date as dodate, d.Sh_info as shinfo from tower_user_tx_doinfo d left join Tower_user_tx_state s on s.txstate=d.Now_state where Tx_id = #{txid} order by Do_date desc ;
mapper.update:
update tower_user_tx_record set state = #{state},
bank_back_id= #{bankbackid} , Complete_date=GETDATE() where Tx_id = #{txid};
update tower_user_tx_source set Tx_id = '' where Tx_id = (select ID from tower_user_tx_record where Tx_ID = #{txid});
mapper.select:
select a.Bank_cardid as bankcardid, a.Fee as fee, a.Wx_id as wxid from tower_user_tx_record a
where 1=1 and a.Tx_id =#{txid};

select a.tx_id as txid, a.Bank_cardid as bankcardid, a.Fee as fee, a.Wx_id as wxid from tower_user_tx_record a
where 1=1 and a.id =#{id};

select a.id as id, a.tx_id as txid, u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele from tower_user_tx_record a left join tower_user_info u on u.Wx_id=a.Wx_id where 1=1 and state=3 and DATEADD(DAY,1,Complete_date) <= GETDATE() ;
